scripts.pwa-assets-generator: pwa-asset-generator src/assets/imgs/logo.svg src/assets/icons -t png -f true -i src/index.html -m src/manifest.webmanifest --path-override assets/icons --opaque false -p 0
scripts.start: ngtw build && ng serve -c test --hmr -o --port 3001 && ngtw watch
scripts.build:app-shell:demo: npm run pwa-assets-generator && npm run format-index && ngtw build --purge && ng run angular-boilerplate:app-shell:demo
scripts.build:app-shell:prod: npm run pwa-assets-generator && npm run format-index && ngtw build --purge && ng run angular-boilerplate:app-shell:production
scripts.build-start-open:app-shell:demo: npm run build:app-shell:demo && npm run start-dist
scripts.deploy-open-app-shell:demo: npm run build:app-shell:demo && npm run firebase-deploy && start https://test-e0560.web.app/
scripts.deploy-open-app-shell:prod: npm run build:app-shell:prod && npm run firebase-deploy && start https://test-e0560.web.app/
scripts.deploy-open-app: npm run pwa-assets-generator && npm run format-index && npm run build && npm run firebase-deploy && start https://test-e0560.web.app/
